documentation.text: @title Conviction Voting for Credit Delegation contract

@notice Stake all my `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens on proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

@notice Withdraw all `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens previously staked on proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

@notice Cancel proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "_a should be less than or equal to 2^128"

arguments.value: _a should be less than or equal to 2^128

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "_a should be less than or equal to 2^128"

documentation.text: @title Conviction Voting for Credit Delegation contract

@notice Stake all my `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens on proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

@notice Withdraw all `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens previously staked on proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

@notice Cancel proposal #`_proposalId`
 @param _proposalId Proposal id

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "_a should be less than or equal to 2^128"

arguments.value: _a should be less than or equal to 2^128

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "_a should be less than or equal to 2^128"

params._link: IPFS or HTTP link with proposal's description

params._amount: The amount the borrower is allowed to borrow (i.e. their line of credit)

calculateConviction(uint64,uint256,uint2.details: Conviction formula: a^t * y(0) + x * (1 - a^t) / (1 - a) Solidity implementation: y = (2^128 * a^t * y0 + x * D * (2^128 - 2^128 * a^t) / (D - aD) + 2^127) / 2^128

params._oldAmount: Amount of tokens staked until now
params._timePassed: Number of blocks since last conviction record

calculateThreshold(uint256).details: Formula: ρ * totalStaked / (1 - a) / (β - requestedAmount / total)**2 For the Solidity implementation we amplify ρ and β and simplify the formula: weight = ρ * D maxRatio = β * D decay = a * D threshold = weight * totalStaked * D ** 2 * funds ** 2 / (D - decay) / (maxRatio * funds - requestedAmount * D) ** 2

params._requestedAmount: Requested amount of tokens on certain proposal

returns._threshold: Threshold a proposal's conviction should surpass in order to be able to executed it.

params._asset: The asset they are allowed to borrow

params._amount: The amount to be deposited as collateral
params._isPull: Whether to pull the funds from the caller, or use funds sent to this contract  User must have approved this contract to pull funds if `isPull` = true

executeProposal(uint256).details: ...by sending `@tokenAmount((self.requestToken(): address), self.getPropoal(_proposalId): ([uint256], address, uint256, uint256, uint64, bool))` to `self.getPropoal(_proposalId): (uint256, [address], uint256, uint256, uint64, bool)`

returns.convictionLast: Conviction this proposal had last time calculateAndSetConviction was called
returns.proposalStatus: ProposalStatus defining the state of the proposal
returns.stakedTokens: Current total stake of tokens on this proposal

params._amount: The amount to repay User calling this function must have approved this contract with an allowance to transfer the tokens You should keep internal accounting of borrowers, if your contract will have multiple borrowers

params._decay: The rate at which conviction is accrued or lost from a proposal
params._minThresholdStakePercentage: The minimum percent of stake token max supply that is used for calculating conviction

params._asset: The underlying asset to withdraw Add permissions to this call, e.g. only the owner should be able to withdraw the collateral!
The underlying asset to withdraw Add permissions to this call, e.g. only the owner should be able to withdraw the collateral!

devdoc.title: Conviction Voting for Credit Delegation contract

borrowCredit(uint256,uint256).notice: Borrows part of the uncollaterised loan

depositCollateral(uint256,bool).notice: Deposits collateral into Aave to enable credit delegation This would be called by the delegator.

getProposalVoterStake(uint256,address).notice: Get stake of voter `_voter` on proposal #`_proposalId`

getTotalVoterStake(address).notice: Get the total stake of voter `_voter` on all proposals

getVoterStakedProposals(address).notice: Get all proposal ID's voter `_voter` has currently staked to

stakeAllToProposal(uint256).notice: Stake all my `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens on proposal #`_proposalId`

withdrawAllCollateral(address).notice: Withdraw all of a collateral of the underlying asset, if no outstanding loans delegated

withdrawAllStakedFromProposal(uint256).notice: Withdraw all `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens previously staked on proposal #`_proposalId`

withdrawCollateralFromProposal(uint256,a.notice: Withdraw all of a collateral of the underlying asset, if no outstanding loans delegated

withdrawStakedFromProposal(uint256,uint2.notice: Withdraw `@tokenAmount((self.stakeToken(): address), _amount)` previously staked on proposal #`_proposalId`
